Title: The Hunt for Zero Point.
Subtitle: Inside the Classified World of Antigravity Technology.
Authors: Nick Cook.
Categories: Body, Mind & Spirit.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=TuaMDQAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: An investigation into classified government projects to build gravity-defying aircraft, sometimes responsible for UFO reports, documents 1940s research into anti-gravity technology and traces its origins in the Third Reich through developments in Europe and the U.S. Reprint..
